effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is holding a berry, it’s destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is holding a berry, it’s destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is holding a berry, it’s destroyed and cannot be used in response to this move.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks opposing Pokémon with fire. If a Pokémon is holding a certain item, such as a Berry, the item becomes burned up and unusable.
